author: Cat Ellis
title: WhatsApp finally cracks down on message forwarding to stop misinformation
description: Starting today, you can only forward messages to one chat at a time, and you're advised to think carefully before doing that.
content:
WhatsApp has announced new limitations on message forwarding, specifically intended to stop the spread of misinformation about coronavirus.
The new rule applies specifically to 'frequently forwarded messages', which have been forwarded more than five times a… [+1515 chars]
